title: Have His Carcase
description: The second Dorothy L. Sayers classic to feature mystery writer Harriet Vane, Have His Carcase. Harrietâ€™s discovery of a murdered body on the beach before it is swept out to sea unites her once more with the indomitable Lord Peter Wimsey, as together they attempt to solve a most lethal mystery, and find themselves become much closer than mere sleuthing partners in the process.
author: Dorothy L. Sayers
